name: Redux Saga Fetch Lifecycle Sequence Diagram
description: Sequence diagram illustrating the complete Redux Saga fetch workflow from React component dispatch through saga processing, API calls, success/error handling, and state updates, showing the interaction between component, saga, API server, and Redux store.
